definition: a brass instrument without valves, to play on a bugle
details:
noun
- a brass instrument without valves
= example: a brass instrument without valves
- a tubular glass or plastic bead sewn onto clothing for decoration
= example: a tubular glass or plastic bead sewn onto clothing for decoration
- any of various low-growing annual or perennial evergreen herbs native to Eurasia
= example: any of various low-growing annual or perennial evergreen herbs native to Eurasia
= synonyms: bugleweed
verb
- to play on a bugle
= example: to play on a bugle
